job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: 100 Remote Franklin TNMinneapolis MN preferredbr brstrongDescriptionstrongbrbrbrWe are looking for midlevel engineers who will be working for the Commercial Data Engineering Team The team works with payment integrity and implementing new clients This person will be tasked with loading client data into the client systems after it has been transformed and enriched by another internal application called DataPoint This team is the bridge between DataPoint and the client downstream systems The application sends data to a prepay system and maps transforms and distributes thisbr brstrongRequirementsstrongbr Undergraduate degree or equivalent work experiencebr A year of practical experience of developing solutions hosting within key major cloud providers such as OpenShift Kubernetes AWS GCP and Azurebr 4 years in the software engineering profession with demonstrated success designing and building highquality commercial software applicationsbr 2 years working with data loading strategiesbr 2 years of development experience using Java or opensource technologiesbr 2 years developing Restful APIsbr 2 years working with CICDbr Expert in SQL technologies across different platforms ie Oracle MSSQL MySQL etcbr br brstrongMust Havesstrongbr NodeJS and APIsbr JavaJavaScriptbr SQL or PLSQLbr Familiarity with CICD Jenkinsbr GitHubbr br brstrongPlussesstrongbr Experience with DockerKubernetesbr Experience with the Cloud Azure specificallybrbr Someone with an opensource mindsetbrbrRestful APIsCICDNodeJS SQL PLSQLJenkinsGitHubDockerKubernetesCloud data loading strategiesJavaJavaScriptAgileSAFEOracleMS SQLMySQL
